Text: thanks from finland, this is the best shit. hope this torrent is working after more than two years...
Note: only part of the the 3rd album is included here.
The 3rd album is a rare find

I'm listening to a film about Big Star right this minute. Thanks for sharing their music. They hardly earned a dime from their recordings, so today is not the time to suddenly feel guilty. Love from Wisconsin and burningrabbit and blushingzebra sound+vision.
